title: MKS Agencies — Backend Patterns (Cloudflare Workers)
summary: Backend development patterns for the Cloudflare Workers API. Covers single-file Worker architecture (src/index.js), route matching pattern, response format ({ success, data/error }), available env bindings (secrets, vars, KV), ConvexHttpClient usage per-request, KV-based rate limiting, admin auth flow (passcode → KV → JWT), Web Crypto API for JWT signing, and Workers constraints (1MB bundle, 10ms CPU, no Node.js APIs).
